title: AI-Powered Invoice Fraud Detector
summary: Machine learning system that detects suspicious invoice patterns for accounting firms.
problem: Accounting firms handle large volumes of invoices, making manual fraud detection slow, error-prone, and costly.
solution: Designed a supervised machine learning pipeline that analyzes invoice features and flags potentially fraudulent cases with explainable outputs.

title: AI Basketball Analytics Platform
summary: AI-powered sports analytics system that processes full-game basketball videos to extract player tracking, events, and advanced performance insights.
problem: Coaches and analysts lack automated tools that convert raw game footage into structured performance metrics, player tracking data, and actionable insights.
solution: Built a computer vision pipeline using YOLOv8 and ByteTrack to detect players, track movement, analyze possessions, and generate analytics such as heatmaps, pass networks, shot charts, and lineup efficiencies.
highlights: Shot charts, heatmaps, and spatial analytics
Lineup performance evaluation and synergy metrics
PDF report generator with radar charts and lineup summaries
impact: Transforms raw video into structured analytics
Provides coaches with advanced insights similar to EuroLeague-level tools
Supports tactical decisions, player development, and scouting
